caption.p: Distribution of genomic elements with hypo-DmCs and hyper-DmCs in the whole genome for each context. ( A) hyper-CG. ( B) hyper-CHG. ( C) hyper-CHH. ( D) hypo-CG. ( E) hypo-CHG. ( F) hypo-CHH. Transposable elements (TE) in red colour; exons in blue colour; introns in green colour; promoter region (2 kb upstream of TSS and 2 kb downstream of TES) in purple colour; intergenic regions in orange colour.
